text: Sunday Bloody Sunday is a 1971 British drama movie directed by John Schlesinger and written by Penelope Gilliatt. It stars Peter Finch, Glenda Jackson, Murray Head, Peggy Ashcroft, and Daniel Day-Lewis. It was nominated for four Oscars in 1972 and was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * Category:1971 drama movies Category:1971 LGBT movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger
title: Sunday Bloody Sunday
